attributes.action: MAKE ANY PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO CYRIL SMITH be available in real time on the BBC News Channel.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in uppercase lettering.  You seem, so often, unable to see what it is we want you to do for us.  We hope this is helpful.

There are so many 'top' people involved in covering up his crimes that there should be no opportunity for anybody in politics nor anybody with huge money to be able to censor the proceedings to protect themselves or their cronies.  The proceedings MUST be transmitted live in real time for EVERYBODY to see justice being done.
